channel.title: CVE Feed for Omron -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Omron -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-17909|2024-08-05T11:01:14.713Z -- omron -- cx-supervisor
item.description: When processing project files in Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.4.1.0 and prior, the application fails to check if it is referencing freed memory, which may allow an attacker to execute code under the context of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-17905|2024-08-05T11:01:14.601Z -- omron -- cx-supervisor
item.description: When processing project files in Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.4.1.0 and prior and tampering with a specific byte, memory corruption may occur within a specific object.

item.title: CVE-2019-18269|2024-08-05T01:47:14.075Z -- omron -- omron%20plc%20cj%20series
item.description: Omronâ€™s CS and CJ series PLCs have an unrestricted externally accessible lock vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-19027|2024-08-05T11:23:08.658Z -- omron -- cx-protocol%20within%20cx-one
item.description: Three type confusion vulnerabilities exist in CX-One Versions 4.50 and prior and CX-Protocol Versions 2.0 and prior when processing project files. An attacker could use a specially crafted project file to exploit and execute code under the privileges of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-17907|2024-08-05T11:01:14.673Z -- omron -- cx-supervisor
item.description: When processing project files in Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.4.1.0 and prior and tampering with the value of an offset, an attacker can force the application to read a value outside of an array.

item.title: CVE-2018-17913|2024-08-05T11:01:14.784Z -- omron -- cx-supervisor
item.description: A type confusion vulnerability exists when processing project files in Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.4.1.0 and prior, which may allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the application.
